Today is #WorldElephantDay. It is estimated over 30,000 elephants are killed annually for their tusks. We are pleased to announce our 100% acquisition of Unifeeder, which serves both deep-sea container hubs and the intra-Europe container freight market. Read more:  https://bit.ly/2MoBZzK  pic.twitter.com/XaWQkldMmg
DP World has acquired 100% of Unifeeder, the largest container feeder and growing shortsea network operator in Europe. Read more:  https://bit.ly/2MoBZzK  pic.twitter.com/pXeKRSWxlK
The LCIA Tribunal has ruled that Doraleh Container Terminal’s Concession Agreement “remains valid and binding notwithstanding Law 202 and the 2018 Decrees”.
The London Court of International Arbitration today confirmed the illegitimacy of the Government of Djibouti’s action of seizing control of the Doraleh Container Terminal from DP World.

Dirk van der Bosch, Commercial Director for Europe at DP World Europe & Russia, talks about our "Supply Chain Diet" in his blog for Port Technology. https://www.porttechnology.org/news/pti_blog_dp_worlds_supply_chain_diet …

DP World has signed a 20-year concession with the Republic of Mali to build and operate a 1000-hectare modern logistics hub, which will dramatically improve the cost and time of trade for the country. Read more:  https://goo.gl/WVrH6H  pic.twitter.com/PQzOQgrAki

Michael Johnson Performance Dubai, founded by Olympic champion sprinter Michael Johnson, will open its doors in October this year at Mina Rashid with a world-class sports facility for athletes and fitness enthusiasts of all levels.  http://web.dpworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/2018_07_24_MJP-Dubai-Launch-PR_EN.pdf … pic.twitter.com/mlDcHFM5fF
